member.name: M:System.Collections.Generic.DictionaryExtensions.TryGetValue``1(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.Object,System.Object},System.Object,``0@)
member.summary: Gets the value of with the given key, or the default value if the key is not present or the value is not of type .
member.param: The instance where both TKey and TValue are of type .
The key whose value to get.
When this method returns, the value with the specified key if found; otherwise the default value.
member.returns: true if key was found and value is of type and non-null; otherwise false.

member.name: M:System.StringExtensions.SplitAndTrim(System.String,System.Char[])
member.summary: Splits a string into segments based on a given . The segments are trimmed and empty segments are removed.
member.param: The string to split.
An array of Unicode characters that delimit the substrings in this instance, an empty array that contains no delimiters, or null.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Mobile.Server.Controllers.CrossDomainController
member.summary: This controller returns files that support cross-domain communication for older browsers.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Mobile.Server.Controllers.CrossDomainController.Bridge(System.String)
member.summary: A page that, when hosted in an iframe, will accept postMessage messages from approved origins and will forward them as a same-domain ajax request to the runtime. This is needed for the IframeBridge transport in MobileApps.Web.js, as used by IE8-9.
member.param: Origin to verify

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Mobile.Server.Controllers.CrossDomainController.Reset
member.summary: Reset helper for unit test purposes.
